28th Nov

Toehider - I LIKE IT! (2020)

#AusMusicMonth

30th Nov

Suldusk - Anthesis (2024)

Closing my month of Aussie music with a top 5 of 2024. This album is captivating. Dynamics are the name of the game, where the folky acoustic songs are every bit as compelling as the explosive blackened post-metal ones, anchored by sublime vocals.

#AusMusicMonth
